items.name: expired-to-idle
items.description: Transition from Expired state to Idle state.

items.name: expired-to-running
items.description: Transition from Expired state to Running state (restart after expiration).

items.name: forced-to-expired
items.description: Transition to Expired state due to forced expiration.

items.name: idle-to-running
items.description: Transition from Idle state to Running state.

items.name: running-to-expired
items.description: Transition from Running state to Expired state (timer elapsed).

items.name: running-to-idle
items.description: Transition from Running state to Idle state.

items.name: running-to-running
items.description: Transition from Running state to Running state (restart).
